thread.section_title: The Standard, High Line - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best rest room views in the world!
thread.title_full: Best rest room views in the world! - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mshotelinspector
title: Best rest room views in the world!
text: Dined at the standard with my other half. The food was amazing, the views spectacular. The live jazz music was incredible. Would recommend to anyone visiting New York. Our table was facing down the Hudson to the state of Liberty with the Empire State on the other side of the restaurant. The rest rooms are all glass and you have a perfect view of the NYC skyline. Felt like I stepped back in time to the 1920s. Like a scene from the great gatsby...also ate a gold bar for dessert.
